plot outline: One renowned and reputed doctor encounters unusual paranormal activities and finds his colleagues in same mess. It is his past and involvement of entire team for misuse of their knowledge and positions. Situation becomes critical when killings of crime partner's start and doctor is helpless. He confesses his crime with near ones but they refuse to help and he finds himself alone in the hands of a girl which is a GHOST. Watch this movie to find interesting facts and loopholes in medical practice.
title: Kanika
plot: A doctor and his colleagues who use sex-determination testing for unethical ends face retribution from a supernatural victim who seeks vengeance.

One renowned and reputed doctor encounters unusual paranormal activities and finds his colleagues in same mess. It is his past and involvement of entire team for misuse of their knowledge and positions. Situation becomes critical when killings of crime partner's start and doctor is helpless. He confesses his crime with near ones but they refuse to help and he finds himself alone in the hands of a girl which is a GHOST. Watch this movie to find interesting facts and loopholes in medical practice.

Kaushik Pradhan is a reputed doctor. Things suddenly change in his life he starts behaving strange and sees spirit of a little girl.Being in medical profession he doesn't disclose it to his near ones as they wont believe it.His colleagues Dr Sawant,Rashmi and Sachin to start seeing the girl and one by one get killed.Pradhan then finds that the girl is _Kanika_ (qv) and realizes that she one of the victim of female Foeticide crimes committed by him and his colleagues.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
